text: Brianne Sidonie Desaulniers, known professionally as Brie Larson, (born in Sacramento, California, October 1, 1989) is an American actress. She played Molly in the 2012 movie version of 21 Jump Street. She also played Envy in Scott Pilgrim vs. the World. Larson won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her role as Ma in the 2015 movie Room. Brie Larson is Captain Marvel. == Awards and nominations== Brie Larson has received many awards and nominations. She began acting at age eight, and followed it with minor supporting roles in various movies. Her breakthrough came with her leading performance in the 2013 coming-of-age drama film Short Term 12, for which she was nominated for the Independent Spirit Award and a Critics' Choice Award. She garnered widespread acclaim for her performance as Joy "Ma" Newsome in the 2015 drama Room, for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress, the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress in a Motion Picture â€“ Drama, the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Leading Role, the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role, and the Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Actress. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role Notes 1999 Special Delivery Little Angel 2004 13 Going on 30 Six Chick 2004 Sleepover Elizabeth "Liz" Daniels 2005 Madison Racing Girl 2006 Hoot Beatrice "The Bear" Leep 2007 Farce of the Penguins I Need a Z-Pack Penguin Voice 2008 Remember the Daze Angie Ford 2008 The Babysitter Allison 2009 House Broken Susan "Suzy" Decker 2009 Just Peck Emily Donaldson 2009 Tanner Hall Kate 2010 Greenberg Sara 2010 Scott Pilgrim vs. the World Natalie V.
